text: Katonda yooyo eyasitula eggulu omusanvu awatali mpagi ze mulaba, oluvanyuma yatebenkera ku ntebe ye, era yagonza enjuba n'omwezi buli kimu kigenda kutambula okumala ebbanga eryakigererwa, atambuza buli kintu, annyonnyola ebigambo, kibasobozese okukkiriza nti mugenda kusisinkana Mukama omulabirizi wa mmwe
